item.text: When the Sabbath was over, Mary Magdalene, Mary the mother of James, and Salome bought aromatic spices so that they might go and anoint him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3029" class="">very</st> <st data-num="4404" class="">early</st> on the <st data-num="1520" class="">first</st> day of the <st data-num="4521" class="">week</st>, at <st data-num="393 2246">sunrise</st>, they <st data-num="2064" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>.

They had been <st data-num="3004" class="">asking</st> <st data-num="1438">each other</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> will <st data-num="617">roll away</st> the <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2374" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>?”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> when they <st data-num="308">looked up</st>, they <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st>, which <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4970" class="">very</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">large</st>, had been <st data-num="617">rolled back</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> as they <st data-num="1525" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tomb</st>, they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> a <st data-num="3495">young man</st> <st data-num="4016" class="">dressed</st> in a <st data-num="3022" class="">white</st> <st data-num="4749" class="">robe</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1188">right side</st>; <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they were <st data-num="1568" class="">alarmed</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “Do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="1568" class="">alarmed</st>. You are <st data-num="2212">looking for</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="3479" class="">Nazarene</st>, who was <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>.<n id="1" /> He has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>!<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st>. <st data-num="2396">Look</st>, there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> they <st data-num="5087" class="">laid</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st>, <st data-num="3004">tell</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he is <st data-num="4254">going ahead</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st>. You will <st data-num="3708">see</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="2531">just as</st> he <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”
Then they went out and ran from the tomb, for terror and bewilderment had seized them. And they said nothing to anyone, because they were afraid.
[[Early on the first day of the week, after he arose, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, from whom he had driven out seven demons.

<st data-num="1565">She</st> <st data-num="4198">went out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="518" class="">told</st> those who <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, while they <st data-num="1096" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3996" class="">mourning</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st>.
And when they heard that he was alive and had been seen by her, they did not believe.
After this he appeared in a different form to two of them while they were on their way to the country.

They <st data-num="565">went back</st> and <st data-num="518" class="">told</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">but</st> they did <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">them</st>.

<st data-num="5306">Then</st> he <st data-num="5319" class="">appeared</st> to the <st data-num="1733" class="">Eleven</st> <st data-num="846" class="">themselves</st>, while they were <st data-num="345" class="">eating</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="3679" class="">rebuked</st> them for <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="570" class="">unbelief</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4641">hardness of heart</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> those who had <st data-num="2300" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1453">resurrected</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">He</st> <st data-num="2036" class="">said</st> <st data-num="2937" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4198">Go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="537" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> and <st data-num="2784" class="">preach</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="2937" class="">creature</st>.

The one who <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> is <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> will be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the one who does <st data-num="569">not believe</st> will be <st data-num="2632" class="">condemned</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">These</st> <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> will <st data-num="3877">accompany</st> those who <st data-num="4100" class="">believe:</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">In</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> they will <st data-num="1544">drive out</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons;</st> they will <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> in <st data-num="2537">new</st> <st data-num="1100" class="">languages;</st><n id="1" />

they will <st data-num="142">pick up</st> <st data-num="3789" class="">snakes</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> their <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>, <st data-num="2579">and</st> <st data-num="5100">whatever</st> <st data-num="2286" class="">poison</st> they <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="984" class="">harm</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them;</st><n id="1" /> they will <st data-num="2007" class="">place</st> their <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="732" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="2192" class="">be</st> <st data-num="2573" class="">well</st>.”

<st data-num="3326" class="">After</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> had <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, he was <st data-num="353">taken up</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2523">sat down</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="1188" class="">right hand</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
They went out and proclaimed everywhere, while the Lord worked with them and confirmed the word through the accompanying signs.]]
